description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Run your way out of a treacherous volcano maze in this arcade style adventure! Challenging and rewarding gameplay awaits those with the skills to master this incredible game!
